ygData.subject: Couple of  questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I just hit level 30 last night, and being the Druid that I am, I had a couple of questions. First, I ve been hunting in South Karana since level 25, hunting
ygData.messageBody:
I just hit level 30 last night, and being the Druid that I am, I had a
couple of questions.

First, I've been hunting in South Karana since level 25, hunting the Tesch
Mas Gnolls around Paw, and perhaps have become a little spoiled, as I have
been getting great experience killing the yellows and whites, and reaping
the rewards of the loot. Now, having reached level 30, all of the gnolls are
now nearing the point where hunting them isn't beneficial. Could someone
suggest a similar zone/area with good experience and average to good loot
where I could hunt fairly safely, either in a group or solo?

Second, Could someone suggest an item for my arm, back, of legs that gives a
decent (around +3) Wisdom modifer that I could try to track down for myself
either through a quest or through hunting loot?

Damasciss
30 Druid
E'ci
